title: Inside stars’ pre-Oscars prep
text:
Oscars 2017: Red Carpet Dresses and Outfits — Best Dressed Celebrities Nadia Salemme, News Corp Australia Network February 27, 2017 9:01am 
HOLLYWOOD’S most famous faces are set to strut the Oscars red carpet in Hollywood. 
But first, they’re being styled, accessorised and made up ahead of the VVVIP ceremony. 
Teresa Palmer, Amy Schumer and Jessica Biel have posted their pre-awards routines on social media, as they prepare for the Academy Awards. 
And while the A-list is yet to hit the red carpet, entertainment reporters including Louise Roe, Zuri Hall and E! presenter Ryan Seacrest made an early entrance. media_camera Access Hollywood presenter Louise Roe basically dressed up as an actual Oscar statue. Picture: Getty Images media_camera White out. E! host Ryan Seacrest posed for an early photo. Picture: Getty Images media_camera Purple reign. E! correspondent Zuri Hall nailed her red carpet look. Picture: Getty Images media_camera Sheer style. Picture: Getty Images PRE-OSCARS PREP
